name: National Intelligence Agency
game_info: Provides an additional spy and levels up all your existing spies. Also provides a 15% reduction in enemy spy effectiveness. Must have a Police Station in all cities.
strategy: An important defensive National Wonder for a technology-driven civilization. The National Intelligence Agency provides an additional spy, levels up all your existing spies, and provides a 15% reduction in enemy spy effectiveness. A civilization must have a Police Station in all cities before it can construct the National Intelligence Agency.
historical_info: A National Intelligence Agency provides government resources for the acquisition of information and intelligence data key to providing security and national defense. Everything from covert operations, including espionage and infiltration, to the assessment of national security risks and response recommendations are made by these agencies. The Central Intelligence Agency of the United States is perhaps the most famous (or notorious) of the world's intelligence agencies, as the program has continually influenced global affairs through various means for decades.
